title: Help with velvet underground / andy warhol font?
content:
Does anybody have any idea of a font that would be similar to the "andy warhol" signature on the velvet underground and nico image i attached?

any help is appreciated.  
Thanks

http://www.studiopesci.it/download/photoes/Velvet%20Underground,%20Velvet%20Underground%20and%20Nico.jpg

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140305061252im_/http:/typophile.com/files/VelvetUndergroundNico_6243.jpg)
author: ajwajw

comments.content:
Just let me add this:

The font is [Coronet Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140305061252/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ludlow/coronet/familytree.html)

;-)

No, she is dead. Very sad. Such a great voice!

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nico](http://web.archive.org/web/20140305061252/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nico "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nico")
